entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Toronto location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-04-29 04:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-04-29 08:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Toronto instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-04-24 03:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-04-24 05:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, New Jersey instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
